name: Segara Hotel & Restaurant
address: Kedisan, Kintamani, Bangli Regency, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1:
I gave this hotel 2 stars because it is actually a 1 star hotel by western standards (not a 3 star hotel). The rooms are very basic and do not expect any luxury . Cats live in the ceiling . There are not ATM and it‚Äôs cash only , and you can‚Äôt pay via any of the online platforms.

The service was ok but we had an issue with one of the attendants in squaring away our food bill and also the fact that we were told breakfast was included but then all of a sudden it was not.

In any case , this is a cheap place to stay with zero thrills and you get what you pay for
review 2:
Beautiful local hotel and just enough facilities for backpack travellers like me. The view every morning and evening is so beautiful.

Don't forget to mention the restaurant that serve balinese food that so delicious for me. Will be back soon when I visit Kintamani in the future..
review 3: Nice hotel close to Mt Batur for the early morning climb start. Clean but basic rooms. The window openings had no mesh which meant a lot of bugs and flies from the lake came into the room. Restaurant served nice food at a reasonable price.
review 4:
Can't even sleep.
People partying till morning. With no time limitation from the hotel. Super disturbing.
review 5:
Room is outdate, but clean
Nothing much you can expect, but no option

name: Batur Water Park Villa
address: Jl. Pendakian Gn. Batur, Batur Tengah, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1: Nice Restaurant at the lake! Weird that you dont know if it is for free. The waterpark is charged extra when you want to swim. Otherwise you can just sit and enjoy your drink
review 2: I stayed here because near from kintamani. It's really cold here but the view is great. You can see batur mountain from here. There's pool but I couldn't swim bcs it's cold. The room is clean, the heater water is work but it's far from kitchen bcs sometimes I need to make a coffee. When you come here, don't forget to bring snacks or foods because no indomaret or foodstall near from the camp.
review 3: The place was nice, but need to improve their service especially for cleanlines in the room. When i entering, the wooden floor in the front of room look not do the cleaning before the guest arrive. The wifi internet was not working in the room, the water was finish in the morning and need to wait about 2 hour. But the staff really nice and helpfull. Thank you very much for the hospitally. Hopefully the cleanlines can improve in the future. üëçüëçüëç
review 4: a place to stay on the shores of lake Batur, complete with a restaurant and a water park, the serving of food is quite long, and the taste is normal, unless you are very hungry., you have to wait more patiently, the resort is good enough for a family vacation
review 5:
10 of us came here for lunch, we wrre here first yet the srrved others first.
I make sure my order was clear! She wrote it down and repeated the order.
1 hour later still a smatering of foid came but not the mains. 1.5 hours later we questioned them and guess what they forgot the main dish.A few of us left without taking lunch, miss our next tour and had to rush back. Disgusting!

name: Hotel Astra Dana
address: Jl. Raya Kedisan, P9FH+84J, Kintamani, Kedisan, Kec. Bangli, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1: Great budget stay with clean facilities, good breakfast and an amazing host! much recommended ‚òÄÔ∏è
review 2: I booked the bungalow room for 4 nights, the locaion is strategic in the front of Batur Lake and actually they have spacious parking lot. The room is good, however there are no tissue and drinks provided, and also the toilet is a bit broken. Aside from that it is ok.
review 3: Good place to crash after hiking. Staff were nice enough to let us know that the hot water tap goes ro the right (did they do this intentionally?) clean enough although you can still see dusty corners, tv doesnt work, no aircon or fan, it's cold already. They provide soap bar if you ask. Make sure you ask the room with hot water (no bath) cause some dont have hot water.
review 4: Interesting and beautiful sunset view, decent room and bathroom (hot water bath avl) for lower budget.
review 5: Clean, Ich spaceouse room,  helpful staff

name: La Danu Glamping and Restaurant
address: P9FG+GWJ, Jl. Windu Sara, Kedisan, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia

name: Batur Water Park
address: P9GH+GQ3, Pelisan, Batur Tengah, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1:
I had lunch here. I ordered mie goreng and it was supposed to come with chicken sate and some other meat, fried egg and prawn crackers.
However, no meat, no chicken sate. The taste of the mie was flat (no kecap or sambal), the egg was over fried.
They still wanted to charge the whole pricr even though half of the items that were supposed to be served with the dish were absent. In the the end the tok a little off the price.

name: Warung Makan Seked Sederhana Mujair Nyat Nyat
address: P9GH+878, Jl. Kedisan, Batur Tengah, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1: Nice fried fresh fish with sambal matah or urap veggies, nice ambience, price also not expensive, they served the food with great taste, beautiful tasty food, place also nice seating and good view, good was served quick with local menu with Balinese taste, recommended restaurant as attached with Batur water park and resort, love the taste of food on my tounge and eyes!! Love to come again to have lunch and enjoy Kintamani and Batur mountain beauty...
review 2: There is a great swimming pool for kids here, warm water and some slides to play on. Nice views over the lake. But the restaurant was disappointing, big menu and only 3 dishes available. The same food is available for half the price at other places nearby.
review 3: Ticket for swimming just IDR 20.000 and water not hot, for take a lunch ,fish is recommended the price and taste so good
review 4: Really nice spot, warm staff, and affordable food
review 5:
8.7/10 for the taste..
6.5/10 for the cleanliness..
over all üëçüèª

name: ACK Kedisan
address: Jl. Windu Sara, Kedisan, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1:
Delicious and good prices
Very friendly service!
The burger was served hot üëç
Try the crispy chicken
I like the cucumber on it
They also have French fries and plain rice if you don't want a burger

Subscribe please üôè
YouTube: Robin on Tour
review 2: Worst ACK I've ever seen. Flies everywhere

name: Hotel Surya
address: Kedisan, Kintamani, Bangli Regency, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1: Walked in, Got discounted rate, solo travel, 150k per night. Double bed with basic toilet and shower (no hot water) Clean enough. Helpful Nice owners. Was seeking a cheap hostel so I was very happy to have a private double bed! Breakfast toastie included.
review 2: Please note : price vary between 300-350k rupiah. Don't pay for more ! Easy track for any level of hiker. Sunrise was pretty decent. Track for going back was superb !
review 3: Well,u need to stay at a small village of Kedison at foothills of mt Batur. The guided trip per person may vary from 40$ .but if u r in a group u can bargain.the steam from growing gives a intriguing feeling.trek is medium to hard.
review 4: One of the best accomodation to stay,eat,drink n hacking fun in tetebatu,clean n tidy,friendly owner and staff,high quality service n nice atmospher.
review 5: Well, i think this is not the right point. It's kinda hostel where you can stay before take a sunrise tour. It's called Surya Hotel & Restaurant.

name: Batur volcano tours
address: Kedisan, Kintamani, Bangli Regency, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1: Having such a nice tour with Rama. We visited Sunrise Point and Black Lava. He took great pictures of us also. Awesome!
review 2: Great!! 1st trial enjoying M. Batur and it was super wow. Bli Cahya, who accompany us was very helpfull, safety driving and very good photographer. Batur volcano tour with Bali Jeep M. Batur will always remind us to the warm welcoming of Kintamani and M.Batur.
review 3:
It was an amazing morning with cautious and professional driver who‚Äôs also a very good photographer üôå

Really recommend this experience! Remember to bring some warm clothing.
review 4: The tour to sunrise and black lava was fabulous...our guide Rama was very nice with us. We had fun singing together and he took some amazing pictures of us. I would highly recommend a trip with Rama and his company when you are in Bali next.
review 5: What a wonderful experience and so well organized and safe! We really enjoyed and had so much fun! Rama is the best driver! Thank you! üôèü§ó

name: Babi Guling Juwita
address: P9CH+HP5, Jl. Windu Sara, Kedisan, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia

name: Warung Mina Kedisan
address: P9FG+GQ5, Jl. Kedisan, Kedisan, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1: Excellent food. Very tasty, recommend to try both the ikan bakar and mujair nyat nyat. Also try the jeruk hangat. It might not have any clear surrounding view, but the taste is simply compensates that. As usual for places around kintamani, lots of flies might interrupt, however asking for candles will help remedy this issue.
review 2:
DEDEY'S guest house Batur Lake.
Nice lake vew and good Bali style place to stay. Dedi and his family is very good and friendly  people.
review 3:
I had an amazing stay at dedy's! The little bungalows are beautifully made with traditional balinese woodwork and roof. The location is also really nice as its only 5 min from the lake where you can experience an amazinf sunrise/sunset. Plenty of things to do in the surroundings, there's trekking on mount batur or just exploring around. Waterfalls, amazing views and a true rural experienxe of Bali.. Thats what you will have when staying at dedy's

Im an actual guest by the way:) haha and I really want to support this homestay. Dadaaaa
review 4: Kind family‚Äôs little place, good to try!
review 5: Food is so jammy and not expensive

name: Warung Lalapan Jakarta
address: P9CJ+95V, Kedisan, Kintamani, Bangli Regency, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1: Lovely little food warung with a great view of Lake Batur. Reasonable prices and well worth a visit

name: Jeep kintamani
address: Jl. Kedisan, Kedisan, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia

name: Rumah Makan Wina Sari
address: P9FF+52V, Jl. Windu Sara, Kedisan, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia

name: Royal Paradise Batur Camping Resort
address: P9GH+GGX, Jl. Kedisan, Kedisan, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia

name: Kuramba Jro Suara
address: P9GH+7JW, Jl. Kedisan, Batur Tengah, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1: We go straight to the lake and stay in one local warung. Really traditional and not fancy at all. We got coffee and some snacks. The two girls who work there are nice and friendly. We even took selfie with them to keep the memory of a good time.
review 2:
The views are great but the restaurant called  Warung Makan Seked is awful.
The fish dishes came with cold chips and frozen veg while the fish themselves had more bones than meat. They also charged 21% tax.
Oh and there were thousands of flies whilst we tried to eat.

name: Jaya Fried Chicken
address: P9CH+CC8, Jl. Windu Sara, Kedisan, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 2: Good but little bit dirty and small portion.
review 3: Very good and price very nice
review 4: The worst Burger that I ate in my life.
review 5: Nice fried chicken with affordable price.

name: Dimsumcious
address: Jl. Windu Sara, Kedisan, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia

name: Warung Lastri
address: P9CH+MQV, Kedisan, Kintamani, Bangli Regency, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1: The owners are very nice people. English menu is available, very good value and the boss can speak in English. I recommend the grilled fish with a slightly spicy coconut peanut sauce. If you are a vegetarian, there are banana pancakes, fried mixed veggies, and gado gado (seasonal veggies salad with peanut coconut dressing). The store is not too visible, there are tables and chairs outside. If you don‚Äôt see the boss, you may try knocking on the door.
review 2: We ordered two grilled fishes with sambal (#13 in menu, 31500 rupias). The owner brought us also 2 plates of rice. I thought that I missed it in the dish description. But then it was told us that we must pay 17000 more for the rice. So be careful and pay attention to this. It is also not clean there and too many flies.
review 3: FRESH AND AFFORDABLE, RECOMMENDED! Try their mujaer fish with sambal bali. So good and refreshing!
review 4: Like many places here blink and you miss it, well don't! We arrived on a warm afternoon and the crispy cold Bintang was a match in haven with the perfectly spiced sambal accompanying my nasi goreng. Don't expect much and enjoy it for the experience it presents you. A beautiful family, a local artist (art is available for purchase), and good food, all part of the journey.....
review 5: Very enjoyable food. Can recommend their banana pancake with chocolate. One of the best breakfast meals I've ever had. Friendly owners and good prices

name: Batur Bagus Cottages
address: Jl. Kedisan, Batur Tengah, Kec. Kintamani, Kabupaten Bangli, Bali 80652, Indonesia
review 1:
Sadly. Owners getting old and lazy. Been coming here for years. I suspected they didn‚Äôt change towels(still hanging on rack) and bedsheets. Surely, next day next room someone checked out. Room cleaned with same sheets still on bed. What a disappointment. Hot water doesn‚Äôt really work or very limited for even 1 shower. Guess this would be the last time I stay here.

Price remains unchanged at 200k. There are some new ones popping up around so please look around. This place has reached its end-of-use.
review 2: Affordable place with nice big rooms with king size bed and mosquito net, only thing the bathroom is big but not maintained, holes in the roof, not clean. The location is very good, with views of the lake and the owner is very friendly.
